name: Caught In the Sheriff's Loop
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a Loop

The life of an outlaw has finally caught up to you, or has it? 

You might be stuck in the lasso of the legendary lawman Bass Reeves, but by great fortune a drought of wakefulness has befallen him, can you escape his clutches before the end of his bewitched slumber?

- Controls -

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

R to reset level
